00016 namespace json_spirit
00017 { 
00018     template< class Obj_t, class Map_t >
00019     void obj_to_map( const Obj_t& obj, Map_t& mp_obj )
00020     {
00021         mp_obj.clear();
00022 
00023         for( typename Obj_t::const_iterator i = obj.begin(); i != obj.end(); ++i )
00024         {
00025             mp_obj[ i->name_ ] = i->value_;
00026         }
00027     }
00028 
00029     template< class Obj_t, class Map_t >
00030     void map_to_obj( const Map_t& mp_obj, Obj_t& obj )
00031     {
00032         obj.clear();
00033 
00034         for( typename Map_t::const_iterator i = mp_obj.begin(); i != mp_obj.end(); ++i )
00035         {
00036             obj.push_back( typename Obj_t::value_type( i->first, i->second ) );
00037         }
00038     }
00039 
00040     typedef std::map< std::string, Value > Mapped_obj;
00041 
00042 #ifndef BOOST_NO_STD_WSTRING
00043     typedef std::map< std::wstring, wValue > wMapped_obj;
00044 #endif
00045 
00046     template< class Object_type, class String_type >
00047     const typename Object_type::value_type::Value_type& find_value( const Object_type& obj, const String_type& name )
00048     {
00049         for( typename Object_type::const_iterator i = obj.begin(); i != obj.end(); ++i )
00050         {
00051             if( i->name_ == name )
00052             {
00053                 return i->value_;
00054             }
00055         }
00056 
00057         return Object_type::value_type::Value_type::null;
00058     }
00059 }
